DOC.brief_summary: Obesity rise Western population BMI show associate increased risk per- postoperative complication . The investigator intend study population 300 patient undergoing laparoscopic surgery rectal cancer . The investigator main outcome measure conversion rate , investigator also intend study indication short term complication , peroperative bleeding , infection , re-operation mortality . DOC.brief_title: Does Obesity Increase Risk Conversion Short Term Complications Laparoscopic Rectal Surgery ?
